about.title: Hola mundo!
about.firstParagraph: Soy Paula Sanchez, desarrolladora frontend con mas de 5 aÃ±os de experiencia en el area. Soy Colombia, pero he estado viviendo en la ciudad de Mexico desde hace 4 aÃ±os ðŸŒŽ
about.secondParagraph: Me especializo en Javascript, TypeScript y Web Performance, con enfoque en React and Next.js. Me encanta crear experiencias accesibles y como parte de mi mision me gusta generar una cultura de accesibilidad en los proyectos donde he contribuido. I've been a full-time software engineer since 2018, and I've had the opportunity to work with some incredible startups ranging from pre-seed to Series C like, which has been an amazing learning experience for me, both in terms of technology and business.
about.thirdParagraph: In my free time, I like to challenge myself to be more creative and improve my tech skills by writing articles on commonly used technologies and subjects that are often misunderstood or take time to understand. I also enjoy giving talks at conferences and meetups.
about.fourParagraph: Thanks for stopping by my site, and don't hesitate to reach out! ðŸ˜Š
